messages.taken_in_past: Oops!,  that's already been taken. Try another?
messages.equal_to_current_password: Oh dear, it's the same as your old password. Try another one.
messages.already_confirmed: Your account has already been confirmed, try signing in now.
messages.confirmation_period_expired: needs to be confirmed within %{period}, just get a new one, it's easy.
messages.expired: has expired, get a new one, it's easy

not_saved.one: 1 error prohibited this %{resource} from being saved:
not_saved.other: %{count} errors prohibited this %{resource} from being saved:

devise.invalid_captcha: Oh Dear, the captcha input isn't right. Try again?

password_expired.updated: Great! your new password is saved.
password_expired.change_required: Ah...your password has expired. Can you bring your password? It's just a one-minute job.
password_expired.forgot_password_message: If you forgot you password click 'Logout' then reset your password. It's a one-minute job.

failure.session_limited: You're logged in on another browser, that's why you're locked out here. Just sign in again here and you're back up and running.
failure.expired: Thanks for coming back. Your account had gone into 'sleep mode' because you are away for so long. To reactivate your account, just go to our support page, give us the email associated with your account and will reactivate you immediately.
failure.disabled: Please don't hate us...your account is disabled. Can you contact Oshi support so we can sort this out for you.
failure.not_allowed_ip: Please don't hate us… but our system doesn't like this IP address. You may be in a jurisdiction we can't accept customers from. Shame, because we would love to have you play on Oshi!
failure.invalid: Oh dear, you accidentally put in the wrong email or password. Try another.
failure.last_attempt: Okay... Deep breath... Pause...You have one more attempt before your account is locked. Good news, it's easy to reset the password and its much less hassle than dealing with a locked account.
failure.locked: Deep breath...your account is locked. This is easy to sort out.
failure.not_found_in_database: We can't find either your email or your password, try another.
failure.timeout: Welcome back. Because you been away for a while, your session expired. Just sign in again to continue.
failure.unauthenticated: Thanks for 'clicking around' Oshi. To continue, can you sign in or if you haven't joined us yet, then sign up...and get a great free bonus
failure.unconfirmed: Oops, you forgot to confirm your email address. If you do that, you can continue.

confirmations.confirmed: Great! Your email address has been confirmed.
confirmations.send_instructions: Go to your inbox now. You'll receive an email from us with easy instructions to confirm your email address. Important! If you don't see an email from us within a minute or so, just check your spam folder.
confirmations.send_paranoid_instructions: If your email is already in our database, you will receive an email just now with instructions to confirm your email address. If you don't see an email from us within a minute or so, just check your spam folder.

omniauth_callbacks.failure: Could not authenticate you from %{kind} because "%{reason}".

passwords.no_token: Okay....You can't access this page without coming from your password reset email. If you do come from you password reset email, please make sure you used the full URL provided, because sometimes email clients 'munge' links.
passwords.send_instructions: Okay, this is all in hand. You will get an email with instructions on how to reset your password just now. If the email doesn't come through in a minute or so, just check your spam folder
passwords.send_paranoid_instructions: If your email is already on our database, you'll receive an email with a password recovery link just now.   If the email doesn't come through in a minute or so, just check your spam folder.
passwords.updated: Excellent, your password has been changed and you're signed in!
passwords.updated_not_active: Great, your password has been changed.

registrations.destroyed: I'm really sorry to see you go. Your account has been successfully cancelled. Maybe try Oshi again in a while...so we can do better next time. Nick Garner - CEO Oshi.
registrations.signed_up: Welcome to Oshi! You signed up successfully.
registrations.signed_up_but_inactive: Were nearly there, you've signed up successfully but we couldn't sign you in because your account isn't activated yet.
registrations.signed_up_but_locked: The good news: you've signed up successfully. The annoying news: we couldn't sign you in because your account is locked. Unlocking your account is easy and quick, just go through the account unlock process or contact Oshi support.
registrations.signed_up_but_unconfirmed: You're nearly there. An email with a confirmation link has been sent just now. Follow the link to activate your account. If you don't see an email from us within a minute or so, just check your spam folder.
registrations.update_needs_confirmation: Great! You have updated your account successfully, but you need to verify your new email address. Can you check your email and follow the confirm link to confirm your new email address?  If you don't see an email from us within a minute or so, just check your spam folder.
registrations.updated: Wonderful! Your account has been updated successfully.

sessions.signed_in: Super! You have signed in successfully.

unlocks.send_instructions: Hold tight... You're nearly there. Were sending you an email just now, with simple instructions on how to unlock your account.  If you don't see an email from us within a minute or so, just check your spam folder.
unlocks.send_paranoid_instructions: Deep breath...If your account exists, we will send you an email with simple instructions for how to unlock your account.  If you don't see an email from us within a minute or so, just check your spam folder.
unlocks.unlocked: Phew! Great news! Your account has been unlocked. Sign in now, if you want.

password.wrong_password: Oops, you may have mistyped your email or password. Try again.

payment.not_enough_money: Oh dear, there's not enough money
payment.not_enough_unlocked_money: Because you've got an active bonus, some or maybe all of your funds are locked. You just need to meet your bonus wagering requirements to be able to cashout i.e. you may need to bet some more. If wagering requirements aren't the problem, please contact Oshi support so we can sort this out with you.
payment.unresolved_cashout_request_presents: Ah, okay...your previous cashout request hasn't been processed yet. Were on it and sorting out your money as fast as we can. Before you can request another cashout, just wait for your current cashout request to be completed. Sorry about all of this hassle.
payment.pending_deposit_presents: Were still still waiting for confirmation of your last deposit. If you need an update, just contact Oshi support.
payment.commission_is_greater_that_amount: That's annoying...commission is greater than amount. Sorry about that.
payment.cashout_only_to_main_address: You have set {{address}} as main Bitcoin address. You can cashout only to that address. Hopefully you understand, it's a security thing.
payment.not_used_account: The account you're going to cashout into, hasn't been used before.
payment.debt_to_another_payment_system: Ah... You've got an unpaid debt in {{system_name}}. Please, can you pay that debt?
payment.debt_to_another_payment_system_account: Ah... You've got an unpaid debt to a different account : ({{account}})
payment.more_debts_exist: You've got debts to another payment systems and accounts. You should pay all these debts before cashing out your winnings. Debt to current payment system is {{debt_amount}}.

commission_connection.not_overlap: Mustn't overlap with other connections with same commission level
commission_connection.greater_than_from_time: must be greater than from time
commission_connection.strategies_equivalence: must have same payment scheme as affiliate profile

commission.wrong_strategy_settings: You have errors in payment scheme settings

external_bet.rollback_expired: Rollback can not be accepted if 24 hours passed after result enrollment

notification/subscription.invalid_types: You can subscribe only to a notification

profile/user.title: Title
profile/user.age_acceptance: I confirm that I am over {{age}} years old

messages.invalid_request: The request is missing a required parameter, includes an unsupported parameter value, or is otherwise malformed.
messages.invalid_redirect_uri: The redirect uri included is not valid.
messages.unauthorized_client: The client is not authorized to perform this request using this method.
messages.access_denied: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request.
messages.invalid_scope: The requested scope is invalid, unknown, or malformed.
messages.server_error: The authorization server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.
messages.temporarily_unavailable: The authorization server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.
messages.credential_flow_not_configured: Resource Owner Password Credentials flow failed due to Doorkeeper.configure.resource_owner_from_credentials being unconfigured.
messages.resource_owner_authenticator_not_configu: Resource Owner find failed due to Doorkeeper.configure.resource_owner_authenticator being unconfiged.
messages.unsupported_response_type: The authorization server does not support this response type.
messages.invalid_client: Client authentication failed due to unknown client, no client authentication included, or unsupported authentication method.
messages.invalid_grant: The provided authorization grant is invalid, expired, revoked, does not match the redirection URI used in the authorization request, or was issued to another client.
messages.unsupported_grant_type: The authorization grant type is not supported by the authorization server.
messages.invalid_resource_owner: The provided resource owner credentials are not valid, or resource owner cannot be found

doorkeeper.rights_title: This application will be able to:
doorkeeper.authorize_as_regular_user: Please sign out from guest account and sign in as a regular user.

scopes.bets: Access your balance data and make bets on your behalf

popup.title: Successfull verification
popup.description: Awesome! The text is now signed by Amatic Industries private signature. You can verify it by any 3d party service.

verification.title: Amatic verification
verification.description1: We provide automated Bitcoin based signature verification software for Amatic games. It protects against fraud.
verification.description2: Simply type in some text below. Amatic Industries will sign it and return back.

not_found.title: Page Not Found
not_found.cannot_be_found: For some reason, the page you're looking for can't be found.
not_found.description: Most likely, the original page may have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable. Oshi SWAT Tech team keeps a track of all new error pages, so we'll fix this ASAP!
not_found.link_to_root: Best option...go back the Oshi homepage :

common.subject: Subject
common.empty_search_results: There are no items according to the filtering parameters

user.failed_sign_in: There's a small problem, you failed to sign in

admin_user.sign_out: Oshi, the overlord has signed out - we miss you oh great one!
admin_user.sign_in: The power is with him...Oshi the overlord has signed in
admin_user.failed_sign_in: Oshi the overlord has failed to sign in - disaster!

notifications.cashout_made: Well done and enjoy your money! Cashout made
notifications.cashout_rejected: Please don't hate us...but your cash at the request has been rejected. If you don't know why,  can you contact Oshi support now?
notifications.deposit_rejected: This is very strange, your deposit has been rejected. If you don't know why, can you contact Oshi support now?
notifications.user_upload_document: Great, that document has been uploaded

issuance_policy.can-refuse: Player can cancel bonus before playing

payment_systems.all_locked: Sorry about this hassle, you can only cashout through payment systems you previously used for deposit. If we can help, please contact Oshi support.

notice.bet_is_not_valid: Ah...the bet isn't valid, try another?
notice.bet_type_not_found: We can't find this bet type
notice.unknown_bet: It's an unknown bet, try another?
notice.unknown_value: You've selected an unknown value, try another?
notice.unknown_column: You've selected an unknown column, try another?
notice.unknown_dozen: You've selected an unknown dozen, try another?

provable_fair.not_available: The provability widget is available on the game page.
provable_fair.is_unavailable: We can't certify this game is provably fair. But it's still a great game backed by our Oshi fair play guarantee.

hint.slots: Spin the reels a bit more:

success.title: Well done! You've been successfully verified.
success.body: Awesome, the hash we sent you at the beginning of the game exactly matches the hash of the game result. Your player's seed had an expected impact on the final result.

failure.title: Ah... Your verification failed
failure.body: Can you contact Oshi supports to sort this out?

bitcoin.send_text: Send any amount of {{currency}} (plus miner fee) to
bitcoin.cant_attach_address: Okay...we have some problems with bitcoins. Oshi support has already been notified and were sorting this out. Can you try again soon?
bitcoin.private_address_note: This is your private depositing address. Any transaction you make to this address will show up immediately in your balance.

xrp.private_address_note: This is your private depositing address and destination tag. Any transaction you make to this address with this destination tag will show up immediately in your balance.

frontend.age_acceptance: Please confirm that you are over {{age}} years old

links.didnt_receive_confirmation: Didn't receive your confirmation instructions? Just check your spam folder in case your Oshi confirmation email has ended up there.
links.didnt_receive_unlock: Didn't receive your unlock instructions? Just check your spam folder in case your Oshi unlock email has ended up there.

contact.title: Oshi contact Form
contact.hint: Can you fill in the form below? All the fields are needed.

no_flash.flash_isnt_available: Ah...you don't have Adobe Flash Player
no_flash.flash_usage: Sometimes Adobe Flash is the best thing for a high definition gaming experience...that's why Oshi uses it.
no_flash.desktop_section_link: Can you install Adobe Flash player for Desktop?
no_flash.mobile_section_text: Yes...It's annoying...Adobe Flash is'nt fully compatible with native browsers on mobile devices. But you can download some great 3rd party apps which allow you to run Flash on your mobile. Try %s and %s.

devise.password_hint: (leave this blank if you don't want to change it)
devise.current_password_hint: (We need your current password to confirm your changes)
devise.unlock_hint: If your account has been locked, just fill in the your e-mail address and we'll send you unlock instructions via e-mail just now. If you don't see the Oshi email in the next minute or so, just check your spam folder.
devise.resend_hint: Fill in your e-mail address and we will send you instructions on how to reset your password via e-mail. If you don't see the Oshi email in the next minute or so, just check your spam folder.
devise.contact_us_hint_html: Contact us through {{page}} if you need any more help.

custom.not_valid_email: Oops, try typing your email in again?

payment_system_redirect.notification: You will be redirected to {{system}} side shortly to finish your transaction
payment_system_redirect.text: To continue your payment, click the button below.

frontend.rules_priority_warning: The Game Rules as published on Oshi.io are in English. Translations into other languages are provided as a service in good faith. In the event of ambiguity between an English version and a translation, the English version always retains priority.

restriction.default: Ah... There's a small problem. Because of Oshi's licensing obligations, we have to restrict this page in your country. That's disappointing, because we think you'd love Oshi.
restriction.game_restricted_in_country: Ah... There's a small problem. Because of Oshi's licensing obligations, we have to restrict this game in your country. That's disappointing, because we think you'd love Oshi.
restriction.registration_restricted_in_country: Please don't hate us…Because of Oshi's licensing obligations we can't accept customers from your country. That's really disappointing, because we think you'd love Oshi.

payment_system.deposit_snippet_name: In snippet use {{cms:helper:payment_total_amount}} and {{cms:helper:payment_uniq_code}} to add payment amount and payment uniq code respectively

profile.currency: You can change currency at any stage after registration is completed.

hints.btc_amount: Amount may differ due to exchange rate changes

name.hint: Identification for your private use only

affiliate_profiles.tip: Revenue for each profile is calculated independantly. Use profile links for players tracking.
affiliate_profiles.no_default_commissions: You don't have any assigned commissions. Please contact support.

form.name_hint: Identification for your private use only

bonuses.refuse: I don't want to receive any Bonuses

show.confirm_address: Oshi security! If we have never seen your email address on our system, we need to confirm it via email. A confirmation link has been sent to your inbox just now. Just click on the link and your email address will be confirmed. If you don't see our email within a minute, just check your spam inbox.
show.address_confirmation_failed: Ah...because your address wasn't confirmed, your cashout was not processed. If you're not sure about sorting this out, can you contact Oshi support?
show.cashout_request_created: We've got your cashout request but it needs approval. Were dealing with this as top priority, because we know how much you care about getting your money, when you want it.
show.cashout_successfully: Yea! Your cashout has come through - enjoy your money!
show.cashout_technically_impossible: Please don't hate us... There's a technical problem which means we can't do your cashout right now. This is really serious and were on it. If you need reassurance or updates, just contact Oshi support and we will help.

autoregister_info.title: You can log in to your account really quickly by using your personal login url

bonuses.title: Bonuses
bonuses.no_bonuses: Ah, okay...you don't have any bonus.
bonuses.cancel_bonus: No bonus for me (Pause...deep breath...think about it before clicking)
bonuses.cancel_bonus_confirmation: Important! If you cancel your bonus, it means we have to 'Zero' your bonus related winnings.
bonuses.bonus_canceled: Your bonus has been cancelled canceled

coupons.not_activated: for some reason, we can't activate your coupon: "{{code}}". Can you try again? And if that fails can you contact Oshi support?

not_finished_games.title: You've forgotten to finish your game
not_finished_games.hint: You can either carry on playing, or maybe cancel your game. Important! If you cancel your game and there's a stake in the game, you will lose that bet.

show.deposit_to_address_hint: Deposit to this address to fund your account.

edit.title: Edit Profile
edit.valid_data_warning: Important! Make sure you enter the correct information in the form below before saving.

payments.wait_for_confirmation: We're nearly there, your payment will be confirmed shortly
payments.address_confirmation_email_body: You've requested a cashout to {{address}}. But, you haven't used this address before. To protect your account, can you confirm this address? It only takes a moment. Just click the link:
payments.address_confirmation_email_warning: Important! If this address doesn't belong to you, can you contact support and change your password?:
payments.invalid_profile_before_deposit_message: Can you fill in the required fields 1st to make a deposit? Just enter the correct contact information in the form below. Tip: just make sure it's accurate before saving.
payments.invalid_profile_message: Important! To cashout, can you fill the required fields in your profile (sorry about the hassle)
payments.try_again: Technical glitch:  because of connection problems, your transaction couldn't be actioned. Can you try again? If you have the same problem again, contact Oshi support.

select_currency_hint.deposit: I'd like to top up my balance

current_balance.cashout: Available to cashout: {{money}}. Please refer to {{balance_link}} page for detailed break down.

payment_methods.empty: Ah...there aren't any available payment methods for this currency.

manual.title: User was manually marked as suspicious

balance_sum.title: Balance amount doesn't match the amount calculated based on transations and games statistic
balance_sum.text: Player's balance doesn't match with expected balance

balance_transaction.title: The winning amount is too big for the last 24 hours

cubits_payment_difference.title: Cumulative cubits exchange rate losses are too big

contact_form.sender_notice: Great! Your message has been sent.
contact_form.mail_subject: From Oshi - Just to let you know, we've received your message through our contact form.

confirmation.you_can_confirm_email_by_pressing_next_l: You can confirm your account email, by clicking the link below?:

reset_password.link_to_change_password_are_requested: someone's requested a link to change your password ( hopefully it was you! ). You can do this by clicking the link below.
reset_password.you_can_ignore_this_mail: If you didn't request this, please ignore our email. But, if you get more than one of these, can you contact support? Then we can look into it and see if someone's trying to get into your account. Also, just as a precaution maybe you should change your password as well.
reset_password.your_password_didnt_changed_yet: Important! Your password won't change until you click the link above to create a new one.

unlock.unlock_my_account: Unlock my account (sorry about this hassle)
unlock.your_account_has_been_locked: Because you've tried too many wrong passwords, your account has been locked. Fortunately, it's easy to sort out.
unlock.click_to_unlock: Just click the link below to unlock your account:

not_enough_money_for_cashout.subject: Ah...there isn't enough money on your Oshi balance for a cashout.
not_enough_money_for_cashout.body: Sorry about the hassle, your cashout request couldn't go through...It's because your account balance fell below the amount you wanted to take out. Tip: do a new cashout request that's the same as, or less than your current balance.

address_confirmation_required.subject: We need your cashout address to be confirmed

credit_card_number.invalid: is not a valid credit card number

retention_mailer.nth_deposit: We are waiting for your deposit

favorites.no_games: No Games in your Favorite list. Use Star icon to add them here.

bitcoin.add_new_addresses: Upload file or paste new addresses
bitcoin.not_enough_available_addresses_left: Only 1 available bitcoin address left. You can add more addresses {{link}}.
bitcoin.increase_system_balance: To increase balance of system wallet please send bitcoins to next address:
